name: @sparkplug/codec
description: Sparkplug B Protocol Buffers encoder/decoder with full ISO/IEC 20237:2023 support

scripts.proto:compile: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 --no-verify -o src/proto-compiled.js proto/sparkplug_b.proto && pbts -o src/proto-compiled.d.ts src/proto-compiled.js
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && test -f src/proto-compiled.js && cp src/proto-compiled.js dist/proto-compiled.js || echo 'Warning: proto-compiled.js not found, browser build may fail'
